website_summaries.verdict: Canyon Bakehouse has mastered the texture of gluten-free bread, and this variety pack lets find your favorite.
pros: In addition to being gluten-free, Canyon Bakehouse is also free of dairy, peanuts, tree nuts, and soy
The bread is soft, chewy, and flavorful
No potato starch means this bread is less dense than others on the market
Mountain White, Cinnamon Raisin, Deli Rye, and San Juan 7-grain

customer_reviews.title: Canyon House mountain bread
customer_reviews.text: This bread is textured like a wheat bread and it smells good, too. It is chewy, but not like wheat and it has a sweet flavor. It holds its shape in sandwich form. It is amazing !!! I purchased because it did not have potato starch like all other GF products. I will buy it again since it is so good
customer_reviews.author: all time bookreader

customer_reviews.title: Tastes just like real bread!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes just like real bread, the only thing to remember is that this product is made with all natural ingredients, so it's important to refrigerate the loaf being used and freeze the others for future use. I found, since I don't use bread every day, that this helps it last longer. Makes great toast! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Nitekat

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. It’s similar texture to the home made bread I make when I have the time. The crust is darker than others but not chewy. I was surprised that it has eggs in it though.
customer_reviews.author: Thea S

customer_reviews.title: this is such good bread. It is soft and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this is such good bread. It is soft and flavorful. It is one of the best gluten free breads I have tried. It's not over-dry like other brands. You can have a deli sandwich with this bread. You can pick it up and eat like regular sandwich bread. It toasts up beautifully! Highly recommend! !!!
customer_reviews.author: A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for stuffing.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is gluten intolerant and I used this to make stuffing for Thanksgiving. It held up well. Not the same texture as regular bread but it worked well. However. Publix carries it for roughly the same price. If home delivery is important then order here. But at Publix you CAN just get one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this for toast
customer_reviews.text: This bread arrived early. It was packed well. Product was fresh and made delicious toast. I will reorder this. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: blondee

customer_reviews.title: Trader Joe’s is better
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, Trader Joe’s gluten free bread is less expensive and has more flavor and old fashioned home made bread flavor than this..it’s ok...but just because I’m gluten intolerant it does not mean than I deserve bland...no flavor bread...it was not good
customer_reviews.author: Celia Wetherell

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tasting bread for a gluten free product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting bread for a gluten free product; I love making grill cheese sandwiches with it, it's so soft; sometimes I'll just eat it from the package plain. I buy this bread all the time along with the raisin bread that's made by this company. It's the best tasting gluten free bread of all the gluten free breads that I've eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Aj763

customer_reviews.title: BEST GLUTEN FREE BREAD EVER !!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST GLUTEN BREAD I HAVE EVER EATEN. LOVED IT, BUT ITI IS VERY EXPENSIVE FOR SUCH A SMALL LOAF OF BREAD BUT WELL WORTH THE $$$$ RECEIVED VERY PROMPTLY FROM SELLER. TOTALLY PLEASED!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the flavor. Better than regular bread. Made my own gluten free dressing for Thanksgiving and my family preferred it over the packaged bread cubes. Also makes great toast. A bit pricey but worth it when you can't have regular bread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yummy g/f bread
customer_reviews.text: I'm avoiding gluten and have tried several types of Gluten-free breads, but none can compare to Canyon Bakehouse white mountain.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M Bataille

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't always get fresh
customer_reviews.text: The bread is very tasty but expensive. It doesn't always get fresh. At this price point, better quality could be required
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many gluten free breads and never found one I like until now!!! I hope they never change the recipe.
customer_reviews.author: watergem

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has wheat, peanut/nuts, and barley allergies. This never causes any reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spoil yourself with this bread!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and delicate flavors like homemade. Best gluten free bread on market!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, it's good bread, wish the crust was softer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Quinn, Sr

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like REAL bread !
customer_reviews.text: After trying every gluten-free bread that I could find, Canyon Bakehouse bread has the taste and texture of "real" bread.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Jones

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bread
customer_reviews.text: The slices are not too small for sandwich making. The ingredients are not inflammatory, and it taste good
customer_reviews.author: Popcorn fan

customer_reviews.title: yummy bread
customer_reviews.text: I have been gluten-free for 25 years and this is the best bread I have eaten. I can now have a sandwich and actually enjoy the taste and texture of the bread
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bloom

customer_reviews.title: I can eat bread again!
customer_reviews.text: Best gluten free bread I’ve found! Head and shoulders above the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a gluten-free bread, but $10 a loaf is quite steep.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a gluten-free bread, but $10 a loaf is quite steep.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lo

customer_reviews.title: Gluten free bread
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gluten free bread I have found, and I think I have tried them all. It is soft and taste like real bread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the price
customer_reviews.text: the bread was probably the best that I've had yet, but don't know if I will be able to afford it. Seems like it's a bit overpriced/
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lies

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The bread is good, the price is outrageous. Can buy at Costco for a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: kristen johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gluten free bread
customer_reviews.text: Has look, feel and texture of regular white bread. The taste is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Harold S. Schlaifer

customer_reviews.title: gluten free and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and I have found this gluten free bread to be the best in taste, texture and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roma594

customer_reviews.title: More like real bread
customer_reviews.text: I am a deli owner. It's a lot easier to work with than other gluten free breads I've tried
customer_reviews.author: Joseph daniele

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and wonderful for making toast or sandwiches.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious flavor and taste, finally, in a gluten free bread!!!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Best GF Bread!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best GF bread we have had! Delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L. Hogan

product_meta.title: Canyon Bakehouse Gluten Free Mountain White Bread 18 Ounce. (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: The Mountain White Sandwich Bread is deliciously soft and full of extra healthy goodness. Enjoy it with PB&J, as a grilled cheese, BLT, or any way you wish! Be creative, and be healthy! Storage Instructions: Store in ambient temperatures for up to a week, or in freezer for several months. Storing in refrigerator slows mold growth, but will cause the product to dry out and stale more quickly. Freeze upon arrival. Bread is Gluten free, Dairy free, Nut free, Soy free and Kosher.
